audio

Class SFXPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • audio.SFXPlayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class SFXPlayer
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    This class used to make a playlist of sound effects (SFX) to be used in the game. The class contains methods to manipulate and access the SFX when required.
    Author:
    henrikwt
